title: The Right Recording | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Right Recording | Joel Osteen
description:
Don’t let negative thoughts keep you from everything God wants to do in your life. If you’ll replace the negative with God’s voice of victory, there’s no limit to where He can take you!


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
